All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AnimationAdapter
Defines a contract for animation effects applied to JavaFX nodes.
Card
Represents a card in the Uno game.
cardRules
Manages the rules and effects of special cards in the Uno game.
Deck
Represents a deck of Uno cards.
EISCUnoEnum
Enum representing the file paths for the images used in the EISC Uno game.
GameStageAnimations
Implements the AnimationAdapter interface to provide common animations such as fade-in, fade-out, and scaling effects for JavaFX nodes.
GameUno
Represents a game of Uno.
GameUnoController
Controller class for the Uno game.
GameUnoStage
Represents the main stage of the Uno game application.
IGameUno
Interface representing the core functionality of the Uno game.
IPlayer
Interface representing a player in the Uno game.
Main
Main class for the EISC Uno application.
Player
Represents a player in the Uno game.
Table
Represents the table in the Uno game where cards are played.
ThreadMonitorMachine
Monitors the machine player's hand in the Uno game.
ThreadPlayMachine
Represents the machine player's logic and actions during the Uno game.
ThreadSingUNOMachine
Monitors the machine player's hand and triggers a callback when the machine shouts "UNO".
